an6.75:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham, kayassa bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
an6.75:1.3: Kamavitakkena, byapadavitakkena, vihimsavitakkena, kamasannaya, byapadasannaya, vihimsasannaya—
an6.75:1.4: imehi, kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham, kayassa bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
an6.75:2.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham, kayassa bheda param marana sugati patikankha.
an6.75:2.3: Nekkhammavitakkena, abyapadavitakkena, avihimsavitakkena, nekkhammasannaya, abyapadasannaya, avihimsasannaya—
an6.75:2.4: imehi, kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham, kayassa bheda param marana sugati patikankha”ti.
